channel.title: User Generated Content on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in User Generated Content on Konigi

item.title: Modernista
item.description: Modernista delivers one of the most unexpected agency portfolios by using UGC tools to display their content. Their site is sort of an un-site. Once you arrive at their domain, a smallish red navigation widget that’s 50px x 80px displays in the upper left of the screen. The rest of the screen is taken over by an 100% x 100% iframe showing their Wikipedia page. For the most part, the red widget is the only bit of the Modernista identity you see in their experience.
